name: Venom Io - Angry Snake Crash
description:
Start as a baby snake, get bigger by eating other snakes
Use your special moves in the death Arena to knock out other snakes.
If your head touches another player, you will die while, on the other hand they will also die if they touch you.
Once you hit them, eat them as fast as you can to gain more mass.
If you're skilled or lucky, you have the chance to survive and to become the biggest snake.
Swipe your finger to guide your snake and avoid touching other snakes.
Gain more and more mass of other snakes and make the biggest snake ever!
Don't let them to kill you.
Kill them before they kill you.
